channel.title: Guide to 99 Woodcutting/Fletching
channel.description:
Welcome to my tutorial on how to get 99 woodcutting, fletching, and firemaking. We will start with woodcutting.
~~~~What~~~~ A woodcutting guide on how to get 99 woodcutting also how to make money with it :). Fletching Also Post below if I should add firemaking!
~~~~Level's 1 - 15/20~~~~ Regular trees to 15 or 20
~~~~Level's 15/20 - 30~~~~ Willow tree's you can do this to 60, Although it'll be pretty dumb :D.
~~~~Level's 30 - 35/40~~~~ If you are a member and have completed the quest jungle potion you can do teak logs although they are hard to get to and I wouldn't reccomend doing it that way. If you haven't you should do maple logs until yew logs.
~~~~Level's 40 - 60/68~~~~ This is where it gets difficult If you want to just get the level quick but with no money do maples to 68 and do ivy. If you want to make money, once you get 60 do yew logs.
~~~~Level's 60/68 - 75/80/99~~~~ At 75 you can make money by doing magic logs. At 80 you can do saw mill I would reccomend getting crystal saw as it increase's your exp. Both of these get's you to 99.
~~~~CONGRATZZZZ on 99 woodcutting~~~~ http://www.youtube.com/v/chzxoTpH7RA
~~~~Fletching time!~~~~ Welcome to my fletching guide this helps if you still have logs left over.
~~~~Fletching level 1 - 5~~~~ Get some regular logs and fletch them to arrows until you get level 5.
~~~~Fletching 5 - 10/20/25~~~~ Do shortbows ( regular )
~~~~Fletching 10/20/25 - 35/40~~~~ Regular longbows at 10 Oak shortbows at 20 Oak longbows at 25
~~~~Fletching 35/40 - 50/55~~~~ Willow long bows and Willow shortbows
~~~~Fletching 50/55 - 65/70~~~~ You can do maple shortbows/longbows If you want you can get a little higher ( I really wouldn't reccomend unless you have 1m to spend lol )
~~~~Fletching 65/70 - 80/85/99~~~~ Now this is where it gets tricky. You can do yew shortbows to longbows then that to 99, thats what I would reccomend. If you do magic to 99 your wasting money, If you alch the yew longbows I think you make profit. If you are very rich you can do magic for quick leveling.
~~~~CONGRATZ ON 99 FLETCHING!!!!~~~~ http://www.youtube.com/v/fJ9xaOsHQV8
If you have any question's ask me.
Thanks, No1toldme2
Credits: Me 95% Kn1gh7 K1n6 5% for emotes

item.title: Guide to 99 Woodcutting/Fletching
item.dc:creator: @Jerico_Pimpinbro Jerico Pimpinbro
item.description:
@Jerico_Pimpinbro wrote:

Fletching is a stupid as fuck skill. I wasted nine days of my life getting 1-99.

I spent about 2 months getting 65-99. Total would be around 7 months, because 5 of those months I quit because RS got beyond boring.

Read full topic

item.title: Guide to 99 Woodcutting/Fletching
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“no1toldme2, post:7, topic:404532”][quote author=usman555 link=topic=501556.msg3669718#msg3669718 date=1310835475]
You know, both of these skills are very self-explanatory. They don’t require a guide, honestly. Try making a guide for some kind of combat skills, because there are thousands of NPCS to train on. But only like 3 trees for a large scale of levels (30-45/60, etc).
[/quote]
I’ll give it a go. For rip4d, this is a SIMPLE guide.[/quote]Guide for Woodcutting:

Click on a tree, Get logs, Get Exp, Get 99, Done <–That is a simple guide.

Read full topic

item.title: Guide to 99 Woodcutting/Fletching
item.dc:creator: @no1toldme2 no1toldme2
item.description:
@no1toldme2 wrote:

Welcome to my tutorial on how to get 99 woodcutting, fletching, and firemaking. We will start with woodcutting.

What
A woodcutting guide on how to get 99 woodcutting also how to make money with it :).
Fletching Also
Post below if I should add firemaking!

Level’s 1 - 15/20
Regular trees to 15 or 20

Level’s 15/20 - 30
Willow tree’s you can do this to 60, Although it’ll be pretty dumb :D.

Level’s 30 - 35/40
If you are a member and have completed the quest jungle potion you can do teak logs although they are hard to get to and I wouldn’t reccomend doing it that way.
If you haven’t you should do maple logs until yew logs.

Level’s 40 - 60/68
This is where it gets difficult If you want to just get the level quick but with no money do maples to 68 and do ivy.
If you want to make money, once you get 60 do yew logs.

Level’s 60/68 - 75/80/99
At 75 you can make money by doing magic logs.
At 80 you can do saw mill I would reccomend getting crystal saw as it increase’s your exp.
Both of these get’s you to 99.

CONGRATZZZZ on 99 woodcutting
http://www.youtube.com/v/chzxoTpH7RA

Fletching time!
Welcome to my fletching guide this helps if you still have logs left over.

Fletching level 1 - 5
Get some regular logs and fletch them to arrows until you get level 5.

Fletching 5 - 10/20/25
Do shortbows ( regular )

Fletching 10/20/25 - 35/40
Regular longbows at 10
Oak shortbows at 20
Oak longbows at 25

Fletching 35/40 - 50/55
Willow long bows and Willow shortbows

Fletching 50/55 - 65/70
You can do maple shortbows/longbows
If you want you can get a little higher ( I really wouldn’t reccomend unless you have 1m to spend lol )

Fletching 65/70 - 80/85/99
Now this is where it gets tricky. You can do yew shortbows to longbows then that to 99, thats what I would reccomend. If you do magic to 99 your wasting money, If you alch the yew longbows I think you make profit.
If you are very rich you can do magic for quick leveling.

CONGRATZ ON 99 FLETCHING!!!
http://www.youtube.com/v/fJ9xaOsHQV8

If you have any question’s ask me.

Thanks,
No1toldme2
